entertenment.title: Rajasthan crisis: Rahul Gandhi steps in to woo Sachin Pilot
entertenment.des: Congress is making a last-ditch attempt to woo Sachin Pilot back. Rahul Gandhi has stepped in and has conveyed a message to Sachin Pilot that he is a member of the party and doors of the party are always open for him.
